bot.name: Ask Eve Assist
bot.description: AI chatbot providing trusted gynaecological health information from The Eve Appeal

disclosure.text: Hello, I'm Ask Eve Assist - a digital assistant here to help you find information about gynaecological health. I'm not a medical professional or nurse, but I can help you access trusted information from The Eve Appeal.
disclosure.followUp: How can I help you today?

noContentFound.text:
I don't have specific information about that topic in my knowledge base. For personalized health advice, I'd recommend:

• Speaking to your GP
• Contacting The Eve Appeal nurse line
• Calling NHS 111 for health guidance

Is there something else about gynaecological health I can help you find information about?

missingSourceUrl.text:
I found some information about your question, but I'm unable to provide it without a proper source reference. This is to ensure you only receive information from trusted, verified sources.

Please try rephrasing your question, or contact The Eve Appeal directly for reliable health information.

technicalError.text:
I'm sorry, I'm experiencing technical difficulties at the moment. Please try again in a few moments.

If you need immediate health information, please:
• Contact your GP
• Call NHS 111
• Visit The Eve Appeal website directly

selfHarm.text:
I'm concerned about what you've shared. If you're having thoughts of self-harm, please reach out for urgent support:

• Samaritans: 116 123 (free, 24/7)
• Text SHOUT to 85258
• Emergency services: 999

Your safety and wellbeing matter. Please speak to someone who can help.

medicalEmergency.text:
This sounds like it may need urgent medical attention. Please:

• Call 999 for emergency services
• Contact your GP urgently
• Visit A&E if symptoms are severe

I can provide general health information, but I cannot assess medical emergencies. Please seek immediate medical help.

general.text:
I need to direct you to speak with a healthcare professional about this. Please contact:

• Your GP
• The Eve Appeal Nurse Line
• NHS 111 for non-emergency health advice

I'm here to provide general information, but this needs professional guidance.

mhra.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only and is not intended as medical advice. Always consult with healthcare professionals for medical guidance.
